data.name: Demolition Master - Destruction Simulator
data.detailed_description:
This simulator is about destructions! Watch towers collapse in rain of rockets.
Weaponry
Different types of guns from missiles to bombs.
Some nature powers: lightnings, earthquake, black hole, tornado

Gravity
Just change it as you like

Maps
45 prebuilt maps. (More to come)
Create one yourself in the editor!

Fire
The wood burns in real life... it burns in this game too!

Campaign
Destroy constructions with limited weaponry!
Sandbox
Or destroy whatever you like as you like it!

Gameplay
Full control of gameplay - fly as a ghost player or switch to a physical body, slow down the time freeze it, change gravity, increase debris amount and enable additional debris effect, increase/reduce objects HP or the force they hold to each other, and much more...

data.short_description: Demolition sandbox with different guns including nature powers. Slow down time, change gravity and much more to play around! With compaign and sandbox mods.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
